name: PronoteBot
description: A bot which can do many things with Pronote Easily deployable on Heroku

URL_PRONOTE.description: The url where you are redirect when you go on Pronote

ENT.description: Your ENT Please check the Readme

CALENDAR_ID.description: Your google calendar id By default it is your google email address

NAME_MICROSOFT_TODO_LIST.description: The name of your Microsoft ToDo list where you want homework to be put. If the ToDo list doesn't exist it will be create.

TOKEN_PUSHBULLET.description: Your pushbullet token to receive a notification when you have a new grade

COLORS.description: A JSON to configure the correspondence between the colors of Pronote and the colors of Google
